fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.ddeployment_cs

Class DistributedCVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.ddeployment_cs.DistributedCVM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentVirtualMachineI, DistributedComponentVirtualMachineI

    public class DistributedCVM
extends AbstractDistributedCVM
    The class DistributedCVM creates a component assembly for the multiple-JVM execution of the dynamic deployment example.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2014-03-14

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
